item.title: about
item.description: Eternity is a minimalist Hugo theme designed for portfolio sites with a fresh feel. This is demo site for Eternity theme. All images are taken from Unsplash. Features Configurable features. Multiple images support. Clean, fresh, minimalist. Integrated lazy load. Automatically creates resized thumbnails. Shows exif if it exists. Installation Install Hugo. Create a new site. hugo new site yoursite cd yoursite Remove default config file. rm hugo.toml If you use an older version of Hugo (< v0.
